channel.title: In the Land of Blood and Honey on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in In the Land of Blood and Honey on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Harrison Dossick, Entertainment Lawyer and Copyright Litigator for Angelina Jolie, Dies at 65
item.description: “Harrison’s sudden passing is an immeasurable loss to our firm and to the legal community,” Peter Weil, Managing Partner of Glaser Weil, shared in a statement.
